sourcesContent:
import { Image,Row,Col,ListGroup,Card,Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import products from "../products"; import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' //My Components import Rating from '../Components/Rating' import {listProductDetails} from '../Actions/productActions' import { useEffect } from "react"; function Productscreen({match}) { const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector(); const {product,loading,error} = productDetails useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(listProductDetails()) },[dispatch]) return(
Go Back {product.name} ₹{product.price} {product.description} Price ₹{product.price} Status {product.countInStock? 'In stock': 'Out of Stock'}
) } export default Productscreen
